original_title: Alms giving to invoke blessings on Ven. Xi Pashao thera
original_body_lines: An alms giving was held today at the Hunupitiya Gangaramaya Temple to invoke blessings on Ven. Master Xi Pashao Thera, the head of Buddhist Tooth Relic Temple and Museum as well as the Golden Pagoda in Singapore, on the guidance of Chief Prelate of the Colombo Gangaramaya Temple Ven. Dr. Galaboda Gnanissara Thera. Ven. Master Xi Pashao Thera has had the longest cordial and fruitful relationship with the Gangaramaya Temple under the leadership of Ven. Gnanissara Thera for almost three decades. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
